titles.title: Investing in All of America Act of 2025
Investing in All of America Act of 2025
Investing in All of America Act of 2025
Investing in All of America Act of 2025

To amend the Small Business Investment Act of 1958 to exclude from the limit on leverage certain amounts invested in smaller enterprises located in rural or low-income areas and small businesses in critical technology areas, and for other purposes.

To amend the Small Business Investment Act of 1958 to exclude from the limit on leverage certain amounts invested in smaller enterprises located in rural or low-income areas and small businesses in critical technology areas, and for other purposes.
Investing in All of America Act of 2025

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Small Business.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held
Ordered to be Reported (Amended) by the Yeas and Nays: 23 - 0.
Reported (Amended) by the Committee on Small Business. H. Rept. 119-227.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 185.

action.text: Mr. Williams (TX) moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill, as amended.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H.R. 2066.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill, as amended Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on Small Business and Entrepreneurship.

committee.name: House Small Business
committee.activity: Reported By, Markup By, Referred To
